_comment: Singapore compliance norms and standards database. Includes IMDA, PSB, NEA, HSA and other Singapore regulatory requirements. Updated for 2025 compliance requirements.

norms.name: Infocomm Media Development Authority - Equipment Registration
norms.applies_to: Telecommunications equipment, radio equipment, IT equipment
norms.description: Mandatory registration for telecom, radio, and dealer-registered IT equipment. Testing at accredited labs. IMDA approval required before import or sale. Covers WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular, networking equipment.

norms.name: Type Approval for Radio Equipment
norms.description: Type approval for radio equipment. Technical requirements based on international standards. Testing at IMDA-accredited labs. Type approval label required on equipment.

norms.name: Specific Absorption Rate Requirements
norms.applies_to: Mobile phones and body-worn wireless devices
norms.description: SAR limit: 2.0 W/kg averaged over 10g of tissue. Testing required for devices used within 20cm of body. Part of IMDA equipment registration.

norms.name: Product Safety and Technical Requirements
norms.description: Mandatory safety certification for controlled goods. PSB Safety Mark required. Testing at accredited labs. Covers household appliances, power supplies, cables, plugs, switches, LED products.

norms.name: Singapore Standard - Household Electrical Appliances Safety
norms.description: Singapore safety standard for household appliances. Based on IEC 60335 series. Required for PSB Safety Mark. Part 1 general, Part 2 specific appliances.

norms.name: Safety Requirements for IT Equipment
norms.description: Singapore standard for IT equipment safety. Based on IEC 62368-1. Required for PSB safety certification or IMDA registration depending on product type.

norms.name: Lithium Batteries - Safety Requirements
norms.description: Singapore adoption of IEC 62133-2. Safety requirements for portable lithium batteries. Required for PSB Safety Mark for battery products.

norms.name: Technical Reference for Electrical Products
norms.description: Technical requirements for various electrical products. References international standards (IEC, EN). Used for PSB Safety Mark assessment. Covers construction, testing, marking.

norms.name: Mandatory Energy Labeling Scheme (MELS)
norms.description: Mandatory energy efficiency labeling. Tick rating system (1-5 ticks, 5 most efficient). Required for air conditioners, refrigerators, clothes dryers, lamps, TVs. NEA (National Environment Agency) administered.

norms.name: Minimum Energy Performance Standards
norms.description: Mandatory minimum energy efficiency standards. Products must meet MEPS before registration. Various standards for different product categories. NEA enforcement.

norms.name: Health Sciences Authority - Medical Device Registration
norms.description: Mandatory registration for medical devices. Classification A, B, C, D based on risk. Pre-market approval for higher-risk devices. QMS requirements. Dealer licensing. HSA approval required.

norms.name: Good Manufacturing Practice for Medical Devices
norms.description: GMP requirements for medical device manufacturing. Based on ISO 13485. HSA inspection and certification. Required for manufacturer licensing.

norms.name: Land Transport Authority - Vehicle Type Approval
norms.description: Type approval for vehicles. Safety standards, emissions requirements. LTA testing or recognition of international approvals. Certificate of Entitlement (COE) system for vehicle registration.

norms.name: Vehicle Emissions Standards
norms.description: Strict vehicle emission standards. Euro 6 equivalent for new vehicles. NEA enforcement. Periodic inspection requirements. Carbon emissions-based road tax.

norms.name: CPFTA - Consumer Protection
norms.description: Consumer protection framework. Unfair practices prohibition. Product safety requirements. CCCS (Competition and Consumer Commission) enforcement. Lemon law for defective goods.

norms.name: Consumer Protection (Consumer Goods Safety Requirements) Regulations
norms.description: General safety requirement for consumer goods. Product recall authority. Safety standards for specific products. Enforcement by Enterprise Singapore (ESG).

norms.name: Safety Standards for Toys
norms.description: Safety requirements for toys. Based on international standards (ISO 8124, EN 71, ASTM F963). Voluntary but enforced under general safety requirements. Labeling and warnings required.

norms.name: Environmental Public Health Act - Product Requirements
norms.applies_to: Products affecting environment and public health
norms.description: Environmental and public health requirements. NEA enforcement. Covers air pollution, noise, hazardous substances. Affects product design and emissions.

norms.name: Extended Producer Responsibility for E-Waste
norms.description: Producer responsibility scheme for e-waste. Registration and reporting. Collection targets. Applies to ICT, batteries, lamps, solar panels. NEA administered.

norms.name: Mandatory Packaging Reporting
norms.description: Mandatory reporting for companies placing packaging. Data collection for extended producer responsibility. Reduction and recycling targets. NEA oversight.

norms.name: Environmental Protection (Hazardous Substances) Regulations
norms.description: Control of hazardous substances. Restrictions on specific chemicals. Permits for import/manufacture. NEA enforcement. Affects product materials and composition.

norms.name: Personal Data Protection Act
norms.applies_to: Organizations collecting, using, or disclosing personal data
norms.description: Comprehensive data protection law. Consent requirements, access rights, accountability. PDPC (Personal Data Protection Commission) enforcement. Applies to connected devices and services.

norms.name: Cybersecurity Requirements
norms.applies_to: Critical information infrastructure, cybersecurity service providers
norms.description: Cybersecurity requirements for critical infrastructure. Incident reporting. CSA (Cyber Security Agency) oversight. Licensing for cybersecurity service providers. Affects security products.

norms.name: CSA IoT Cybersecurity Guide
norms.description: Cybersecurity guide for IoT. Best practices for manufacturers and system integrators. Four security levels. Voluntary but increasingly expected. CSA guidance.

norms.name: Singapore Food Agency - Food Contact Materials
norms.description: Safety requirements for food contact materials and articles. Standards for various materials. Migration limits. SFA approval and registration.

norms.name: Sale of Food Act - Labeling Requirements
norms.description: Mandatory labeling requirements for food. Ingredient listing, nutritional information, allergen declarations, date marking. English labeling required. SFA enforcement.

norms.name: Trademark Protection
norms.description: Trademark registration and protection. IPOS (Intellectual Property Office of Singapore) administration. Prevents unauthorized use. Strong enforcement against counterfeits.

norms.name: Patent Protection for Innovations
norms.description: Patent protection for inventions and utility models. IPOS registration. 20-year protection. Important IP hub in Asia.

norms.name: Building Safety and Construction Standards
norms.description: Building safety requirements. BCA (Building and Construction Authority) regulations. Affects electrical systems, fire safety, building materials. Product approvals required.

norms.name: Fire Safety Requirements
norms.applies_to: Fire safety equipment and building fire protection
norms.description: Fire safety requirements for buildings and equipment. SCDF (Singapore Civil Defence Force) approval. Fire detection, suppression, emergency systems. Product certification required.

norms.name: Water Efficiency Labeling Scheme
norms.description: Mandatory water efficiency labeling and registration. Tick rating system. PUB (Public Utilities Board) administered. Covers taps, showerheads, WCs, urinals, washing machines.

norms.name: Workplace Safety and Health Act
norms.description: Workplace safety requirements. MOM (Ministry of Manpower) enforcement. Affects machinery, electrical equipment, PPE. Risk assessment and control measures.

norms.name: BCA Green Mark for Buildings
norms.description: Green building certification scheme. Voluntary but widely adopted. Affects building materials, systems, equipment. BCA certification.

norms.name: SGLS Eco-Label
norms.description: Voluntary environmental labeling. Type I eco-label (ISO 14024). Criteria for various product categories. SEC (Singapore Environment Council) certification.

norms.name: Singapore Customs - HS Classification
norms.description: HS-based product classification. Determines duties, GST, regulatory requirements. Accurate classification required for customs clearance. TradeNet system for declarations.

norms.name: Controlled and Prohibited Goods
norms.description: Import/export permits required for controlled goods. Various agencies (IMDA, PSB, HSA, NEA) issue permits. TradeNet integration. Pre-shipment approval needed.

norms.name: Quality Management Systems (Singapore Standard)
norms.description: Singapore adoption of ISO 9001. Quality management system certification. SAC (Singapore Accreditation Council) accredits certification bodies.

norms.name: Environmental Management Systems (Singapore Standard)
norms.description: Singapore adoption of ISO 14001. Environmental management system certification. SAC accreditation.

norms.name: Information Security Management Systems (Singapore Standard)
norms.description: Singapore adoption of ISO/IEC 27001. Information security management certification. Important for IT services and critical infrastructure.

norms.name: Singapore Accreditation Council
norms.applies_to: Testing labs, certification bodies, inspection bodies
norms.description: National accreditation body. Accredits labs and certification bodies for product certification, testing. ISO/IEC 17025, 17065, 17020 requirements. SAC accreditation widely required.

norms.name: Competition and Consumer Protection
norms.description: Prohibits anti-competitive practices and unfair trading. CCCS enforcement. Affects product pricing, advertising, distribution agreements.

norms.name: Consumer Rights for Goods
norms.description: Implied terms for sale of goods. Goods must be of satisfactory quality, fit for purpose, as described. Consumer remedies for defective goods.

norms.name: Consumer Protection (Lemon Law) Provisions
norms.description: Protection for defective goods. Repair, replacement, refund, or price reduction. Applies within 6 months of delivery. Specific provisions for new motor vehicles.

norms.name: Product Liability Under Consumer Protection Act
norms.description: Liability for defective products causing damage. Strict liability for manufacturers, importers. Complements general tort law. Important for product safety.

norms.name: Legal Metrology and Weights & Measures
norms.description: Legal metrology requirements. Verification of measuring instruments used in trade. Prepackaged goods net content. Enterprise Singapore enforcement.

norms.name: Singapore Energy Storage Safety Standards
norms.applies_to: Energy storage systems and large battery installations
norms.description: Safety requirements for energy storage systems. Fire safety, electrical safety, system integration. SCDF and EMA (Energy Market Authority) oversight. Important for solar+storage, grid storage.

norms.name: Smart Nation Technical Reference Standards
norms.applies_to: Smart city technologies and IoT devices
norms.description: Technical standards for smart nation initiatives. Interoperability, cybersecurity, data exchange. IMDA and Smart Nation initiatives. Affects IoT, sensors, smart city products.
